experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Edtech platform to teach musical instruments to kids online. Raised a Seed round, expanded to three geographies, but couldn't achieve the desired growth.
experience.description_html: Edtech platform to teach musical instruments to kids online. Raised a Seed round, expanded to three geographies, but couldn't achieve the desired growth. <!---->

experience.title: Founding Member and Head of Sales
experience.description: Joined at pre seed stage. Pivoted from Marketplace to SaaS. Main functions:1. B2B Sales:-Direct sales to C-Level Executives-Up selling, cross selling-Building and scaling teams and processes from scratch-Setup Sales in Europe and Client Acquisition in Germany, France, UK2. Key Account Management & Operations: Client success and retention3. Product: Conceptualising new products, testing MVPs with clients
